snippet: Private equity firms like the Blackstone Group, which collectively oversee thousands of companies, are using their size and scope to pressure suppliers, set their own prices and exert their influence in a range of industries.
abstract: Private equity firms like the Blackstone Group, which collectively oversee thousands of companies, are using their size and scope to pressure suppliers, set their own prices and exert their influence in a range of industries.

headline.main: Private Equity Giants Use Size to Lean on Suppliers
